tideLayoutTreemap
service in module tide-angular

Description

Creates a layout (node array with position attributes) for building a TreeMap

Dependencies

  • d3
  • _

Methods

  • colorAttribute(Name)

    Sets or gets the attribute that defines the category used for grouping by color

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    Namestring

    of the attrribute that defines the category used for different colors in each column

    Returns
    object

    Layout instance or current value (if no argument given)

  • nodes(data)

    Generates and array with nodes based on the inpit data, but including position information (x, y, dx, dy)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    dataarray

    array with data objects (Ex: [{id:1, type:public, zone:rural, students:127}])

    Returns
    array

    array with nodes data (inlcuding position params x,y,dx,dy)

  • size(Array)

    Sets or gets (if no argument given) the size of the Treemap [width, height]

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    Arrayarray

    with [width, height] information

    Returns
    object

    Layout instance or current value (if no argument given)

  • sizeAttribute(Name)

    Sets or gets the attribute that defines the size of the units

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    Namestring

    of the attrribute that defines the size of each component (Ex 'students')

    Returns
    object

    Layout instance or current value (if no argument given)

  • xAttribute(Name)

    Sets or gets the attribute that defines the category used for grouping by columns

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    Namestring

    of the attrribute that defines the category used for different columns when displayin the units

    Returns
    object

    Layout instance or current value (if no argument given)

  • xAttribute()

    Gets info from titles labels and their respective width & size (in number of units) [{title, width, size}]

    Returns
    array

    Array with column title info
